word:
I spoke last Sabbath with my new teeth, and spoke quite well, but my gums are too sore to take much pleasure in them. It will take time to restore health to the gums. I know I shall enjoy my teeth very much, for 


                                    -87- 

Sister Caro is a superior dentist. She has all the work she can do.--Letter 33, 1893, pp. 1, 2. (To Mrs. Jennie L. Ings, September 26, 1893.)
